article_title: MIT’s New Consortium Wants to Help CISOs Better Manage Security
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: One of the aims of MIT's new research effort is to help chief information security officers at critical infrastructure companies gauge the return on investment for cybersecurity tools.
